verses.verse: A Psalm of David <WH1732>. I will praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thee with my whole heart <WH3820>: before the 'elohim <WH430> will I sing praise <WH2167> <WH8762> unto thee.

I will worship <WH7812> <WH8691> toward thy holy <WH6944> temple <WH1964>, and praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thy name <WH8034> for thy lovingkindness <WH2617> and for thy truth <WH571>: for thou hast magnified <WH1431> <WH8689> thy word <WH565> above all thy name <WH8034>.
In the day <WH3117> when I cried <WH7121> <WH8804> thou answeredst <WH6030> <WH8799> me, and strengthenedst <WH7292> <WH8686> me with strength <WH5797> in my soul <WH5315>.
All the kings <WH4428> of the earth <WH776> shall praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thee, O YY <WH3068>, when they hear <WH8085> <WH8804> the words <WH561> of thy mouth <WH6310>.
Yea, they shall sing <WH7891> <WH8799> in the ways <WH1870> of the YY <WH3068>: for great <WH1419> is the glory <WH3519> of the YY <WH3068>.
Though the YY <WH3068> be high <WH7311> <WH8802>, yet hath he respect <WH7200> <WH8799> unto the lowly <WH8217>: but the proud <WH1364> he knoweth <WH3045> <WH8799> afar off <WH4801>.

Though I walk <WH3212> <WH8799> in the midst <WH7130> of trouble <WH6869>, thou wilt revive <WH2421> <WH8762> me: thou shalt stretch forth <WH7971> <WH8799> thine hand <WH3027> against the wrath <WH639> of mine enemies <WH341> <WH8802>, and thy right hand <WH3225> shall save <WH3467> <WH8686> me.

The YY <WH3068> will perfect <WH1584> <WH8799> that which concerneth me: thy mercy <WH2617>, O YY <WH3068>, endureth for ever <WH5769>: forsake <WH7503> <WH8686> not the works <WH4639> of thine own hands <WH3027>.
